headline: Medtronic to announce financial results for its first quarter of fiscal year 2026
summary: Medtronic plc (NYSE: MDT), a global leader in healthcare technology, today announced that it will report financial results on Tuesday, August 19, 2025, for its first quarter of fiscal year 2026, which ended on Friday, July 25, 2025,

headline: Why Medtronic (MDT) is Poised to Beat Earnings Estimates Again
summary: Medtronic (MDT) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.

headline: United States Smart Pills Market Research and Company Analysis Report 2025-2033 Featuring Check-Cap, General Electric, Fujifilm, Koninklijke Philips, Medtronic, Olympus, Novartis, Otsuka
summary: The United States Smart Pills Market is set to grow significantly, reaching US$ 4.13 billion by 2033, up from US$ 1.53 billion in 2024, with a CAGR of 11.66% from 2025 to 2033. Driving forces include rising demand for minimally invasive diagnostics, a surge in gastrointestinal disorders, an aging population, and advancements in wireless capsule technology.
